speaker: Eli
text: This is the module that was built over six years ago. The developer who originally wrote it left the company ages ago.
ipa: ðɪs ɪz ðə ˈmɒdʒuːl ðæt wəz bɪlt ˈəʊvə sɪks jɪəz əˈɡəʊ. ðə dɪˈvɛləpə huː əˈrɪdʒɪnəli rəʊt ɪt lɛft ðə ˈkʌmpəni ˈeɪdʒɪz əˈɡəʊ.

speaker: Noah
text: Yeah, I was looking through some of the functions which are still being called in production. There’s one that updates the cache every 30 seconds.
ipa: jæ, aɪ wəz ˈlʊkɪŋ θruː sʌm əv ðə ˈfʌŋkʃənz wɪʧ ə stɪl ˈbiːɪŋ kɔːld ɪn prəˈdʌkʃən. ðɛəz wʌn ðæt ˈʌpdeɪts ðə kæʃ ˈɛvri ˈθɜːti ˈsɛkəndz.

speaker: Eli
text: Ah yes, I remember that. We had an issue last year which took days to debug because of that caching logic.
ipa: ɑː jɛs, aɪ rɪˈmɛmbə ðæt. wiː hæd ən ˈɪʃuː lɑːst jɪə wɪʧ tʊk deɪz tuː ˈdiːbʌɡ bɪˈkɒz əv ðæt ˈkæʃɪŋ ˈlɒdʒɪk.

speaker: Noah
text: I noticed a folder which hasn’t been touched since 2019. Should I remove the scripts that aren’t being used?
ipa: aɪ ˈnəʊtɪst ə ˈfəʊldə wɪʧ ˈhæzənt bɪn tʌʧt sɪns tuː ˈθaʊzənd ənd naɪnˈtiːn. ʃʊd aɪ rɪˈmuːv ðə skrɪpts ðæt ɑːnt ˈbiːɪŋ juːzd?

speaker: Eli
text: Not yet. We should check with Emma, who was the last to work on this service. There might be something which still connects with the billing engine.
ipa: nɒt jɛt. wiː ʃʊd ʧɛk wɪð ˈɛmə, huː wəz ðə lɑːst tuː wɜːk ɒn ðɪs ˈsɜːvɪs. ðɛə maɪt biː ˈsʌmθɪŋ wɪʧ stɪl kəˈnɛkts wɪð ðə ˈbɪlɪŋ ˈɛnʤɪn.

speaker: Noah
text: Got it. Also, there’s a config file in which multiple environments are defined. Some of the staging URLs that point to deprecated services are throwing warnings.
ipa: ɡɒt ɪt. ˈɔːlsəʊ, ðɛəz ə ˈkɒnfɪɡ faɪl ɪn wɪʧ ˈmʌltɪpl ɪnˈvaɪrənmənts ə dɪˈfaɪnd. sʌm əv ðə ˈsteɪʤɪŋ ˌjuːɑːˈɛlz ðæt pɔɪnt tuː ˈdɛprəkeɪtɪd ˈsɜːvɪsɪz ə ˈθrəʊɪŋ ˈwɔːnɪŋz.

speaker: Eli
text: Good catch. That config is one of those files that everyone is afraid to touch.
ipa: ɡʊd kæʧ. ðæt ˈkɒnfɪɡ ɪz wʌn əv ðəʊz faɪlz ðæt ˈɛvrɪwʌn ɪz əˈfreɪd tuː tʌʧ.

speaker: Noah
text: I totally get that. Even the documentation which explains the setup is vague.
ipa: aɪ ˈtəʊtəli ɡɛt ðæt. ˈiːvən ðə ˌdɒkjʊmɛnˈteɪʃən wɪʧ ɪksˈpleɪnz ðə ˈsɛtʌp ɪz veɪɡ.

speaker: Eli
text: That’s why we’re rewriting it. We want a system that anyone can understand and maintain.
ipa: ðæts waɪ wɪə ˈriːˌraɪtɪŋ ɪt. wiː wɒnt ə ˈsɪstəm ðæt ˈɛnɪwʌn kən ˌʌndəˈstænd ənd meɪnˈteɪn.

speaker: Noah
text: Makes sense. I’ll start drafting a diagram which outlines all the current dependencies.
ipa: meɪks sɛns. aɪl stɑːt ˈdrɑːftɪŋ ə ˈdaɪəɡræm wɪʧ ˈaʊtlaɪnz ɔːl ðə ˈkʌrənt dɪˈpɛndənsiz.

speaker: Eli
text: Perfect. Also check the mailing list archives — there might be an email thread in which the rollout plan was discussed.
ipa: ˈpɜːfɪkt. ˈɔːlsəʊ ʧɛk ðə ˈmeɪlɪŋ lɪst ˈɑːkaɪvz — ðɛə maɪt biː ən ˈiːmeɪl θrɛd ɪn wɪʧ ðə ˈrəʊlaʊt plæn wəz dɪˈskʌst.
